creator: bit-bucket@gmx.net
text:
The paragraph "Alternate password storage" of the Authentication How-To ("docs/manual/howto/auth.xml") mentions a directive called "AuthBasicSource" > Rather than selecting > AuthBasicSource file, instead you can choose dbm or > dbd as your storage format.

I think this must be "AuthBasicProvider" (in TRUNK too). BTW: Maybe you want to add some markup to show that "AuthBasicProvider file" is a quote of a directive.
